summary: Mount Vesuvius is a volcano in Italy, near Naples. It's famous for its eruption in 79 AD that destroyed Roman cities like Pompeii. The explosion was huge, sending ash and rocks high into the sky. Many people died, and we know about it from letters written by Pliny the Younger. Vesuvius is still active and considered very dangerous because many people live nearby. It's known for powerful eruptions called Plinian eruptions.
title: Mount Vesuvius
